TopicTitle: So, what's roblox like these days?

Articles.Content: Roblox was pretty much the first thing I played online, and the first thing I downloaded, back in maybe 2009, I had a blast, especially with the airport and tycoon maps. How is it now? I go to the front page and see a rollercoaster in the backround. The community is probably rubbish, but how is it?

Some of the games are pretty interesting and fun. But the community sucks still.

It's been awhile since i looked at the site, let alone played a game there.
its full of [content deleted] games, groups, and players.

When I joined years ago (probly same time as op) it was great, armored patrol, galleons, other wingman8 stuff...

But by the time I stopped it was becoming trash ("role playing") things, anything decent had absolutely no people on it..

But then again that was a year about ago, maybe its changed...
There are some decent games left, such as the wingman8 stuff. The community is still kinda poop though.

The community? It's complete garbage. There are still a few games I like, such as "Apocalypse Rising," "Armored patrol," and others.

But hey! The software is awesome! they just released a feature called "Solid Modelling' which allows you to create irregular polygons! I've tried it out, and it is amazing!
